description.narrative: By the end of 2014, institutional capacity in planning, management and communication throughout the Ministry, from central to decentralized levels, is stronger as a result of better governance and enhanced accountability within the overall education system, which contributes to Education â€“ General, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Learning And Child-Friendly Schools, Learning Outcomes, Operations Support To Programme Delivery. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By the end of 2014, support to the Interim Education Plan (PIE) contributes to the national target of 85% of children completing basic quality education
